thread.section_title: Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Value for NYC
thread.title_full: Great Value for NYC - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Shonda Brown W
title: Great Value for NYC
text: I recently stayed here during a leisure/business trip and was surprised with the price considering it was NYFW. It was in a great location and close to Soho shopping and eateries, as well as the office location I had to go to while on the trip. Early check-in wasn't available, and if you know NYC then you know you can't expect a lot of space in your room, but it was just me, so it was just fine. It was clean and I didn't have any issues really.
